issue.title: [C++] Test precision range for decimal data type in C++
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15162](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15162). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Would it be possible to test the range for the decimal precision in C++? At the moment this functionality is being tested in the \{arrow} R package and the GLib library.

[This PR](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11773/files) captures perfectly the location of the unit tests.
